comments: Griffin (DET) makes contact to Drummond's (CLE) arm as he gathers and enters his shooting motion in the post.
Griffin (DET) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Sexton (CLE) firms up and absorbs the contact.
Dummond (CLE) cleanly blocks Rose's (DET) jump shot attempt, prior to the incidental high five contact at the release.
Grant (DET) wraps Drummond's (CLE) around his lower body as he gathers and enters his shooting motion
Plumlee (DET) has a resting hand on Drummond's (CLE) lower body during his post up.
Love (CLE) and Griffin (DET) engage and then disengage during the inbound.
Detroit does not get a shot attempt that makes contact with the rim up within the twenty four seconds allotted.
Griffin (DET) gets both hands on the ball but then makes incidental contact with Drummond (CLE) as he attempts to tip the ball in.
Plumlee (DET) delivers contact to the backside of Sexton (CLE) while setting the pick, disrupting his ability to defend.
As Garland (CLE) is going to set the screen on Grant (DET) both players collide into each as a switch occurs on defense.
Griffin (DET) makes slight contact to Drummond's (DET) hand which is deemed as part of the ball, and cleanly dislodges it from his possession in the post.
Sexton (CLE) slightly extends his off arm into Wright's (DET) upper body, but does not disrupt his ability to defend.
Grant (DET) makes contact with the ball after hit has touched the backboard.
Drummond (CLE) maintains a legal guarding position during the driving shot attempt by Grant (DET) and cleanly blocks the layup attempt.
Sexton (CLE) and Grant (DET) make incidental contact with each other in pursuit of the loose ball.
Sexton (CLE) and Griffin (DET) make incidental contact with each other in pursuit of the loose ball.
Okoro (CLE) and Rose (DET) make incidental contact with each in pursuit of the loose ball. Jump ball is called between these two players.
Griffin (DET) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Sexton (CLE) firms up and absorbs the contact.
Drummond (CLE) makes contact to Rose's (DET) arm that causes him to lose possession of the basketball.
Griffin (DET) incidentally steps on Drummond's (CLE) foot while trying to defend, which causes him to fall to the ground.
In pursuit of the loose ball, Sexton (CLE) dives into Griffin's (DET) leg causing him to fall to the ground.
